sorttype.name: quicksort
sorttype.code: def sort(list): length = list.__len__() if 1 >= length: return list center = length /2 centerElm = list[center] left = 0 right = length - 1 while right > left: while centerElm > list[left]: left += 1 while list[right] > centerElm: right -= 1 if (right >= left): tmp = list[left] list[left] = list[right] list[right] = tmp left += 1 right -= 1 sublist = sort(list[:right+1]) sublist.extend(sort(list[left:])) return sublist
